thread.title: Aviareps assigns new GM for Australia, New Zealand
thread.title_full: Aviareps assigns new GM for Australia, New Zealand

author: Sydney, August 27, 2015
title: Aviareps assigns new GM for Australia, New Zealand
text:
Aviareps assigns new GM for Australia, New Zealand Sydney, August 27, 2015 
FROM September 2015, Emilie Groleau will be taking over as general manager at Aviareps Oceania, replacing Peter Power who is stepping down from the position due to injuries sustained from a car accident several months ago. 

Groleau joined Aviareps in 2013, and has held business development, change management and account management roles in the companyâ€™s offices in Amsterdam, Munich, Dubai and Milan before settling in Sydney earlier this year. 

Credit: Aviareps 

Prior to joining Aviareps, the Canadian national had filled various management, consulting and communication roles in organisations such as the UN, New York University and Sustainable Travel International.
